name: Image Sliders
description:
Image Sliders

are you bored on you phone nothing to do and want too relax by doing something?. Try Out Image Sliders,  a puzzle game where you put broken pictures back together.

 Submitted for Inter Dev jam 2020, with the theme of Shapes, where i got inspiration of rebuilding pictures with the shapes in the background.

Credits:

Emanuel Acosta (Photographer and Solo dev)
